name: Restoration
description: As beneficial as the Romulans have been to Earth's past, it will lead to a future of irrelevancy and perhaps even extinction for humanity. Help restore Earth's original history for the good of the Federation.
rules:
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Supply Missions in one Phase, and Ship Battles in another Phase.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Hernandez, Narissa, Reed, Enterprise crew, Humanoid Figure, or crew with matching Battle Traits will provide a bonus to Ship Battles.
-- Using the Generational NX-01 Enterprise, Scimitar, or Valdore class ship will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Every Ship Battle or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 1 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Hernandez, Narissa, Reed, Enterprise crew, or Humanoid Figure
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Narissa
featured_crew.flavor: A Zhat Vash agent in charge of gaining information at the Romulan Reclamation project.

adventures.description: Secure Yuri Gagarin's place in spaceflight history.

adventures.name: T'Plana-Hath
adventures.description: Confirm Vulcans are again official first contact.

adventures.name: Babel Drone
adventures.description: Reconstruct a key ship in the founding.

rewards.name: Restoration
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

rewards.name: Narissa
rewards.flavor: A Zhat Vash agent in charge of gaining information at the Romulan Reclamation project.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

next_threshold_rewards.name: Chronitons
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Humanity's historical significance and position of power in the Federation are crucial to the future of the universe. You must restore Earth's original timeline--without the Romulans."
"I think the world of us as a species... but is it right, reinflicting all that suffering on our ancestors for our own sakes? The wars I remember, fought in space, have been bad enough...."

"We're getting ahead of ourselves. First, we need to make sure there's enough of the original ancient Earth left to save. Let's hope the Rosetta Stone isn't covered in Romulan script by this point...."

"Why are you fighting this? Humanity will still get to help found the Federation, explore the stars. You'll have more respect than when the Vulcans first found you, without all the embarrassing baggage of your past. At least, for a while."

responses.text: "Captain Hernandez is right. We earned our place in history, through our mistakes."
"My head's spinning between all these timelines. What are you talking about?"
"But they were trying to start a war then. This is just... surpassing us."

screens.text: "Your people tried this once before, with your disguised drones, the horror you inflicted on the Aenar. But Captain Archer stopped you, and it was the making of the Federation. We won't let you undo us now."

"In my and Captain Archer's time, the Romulans tried to start a war between Earth, Vulcan, Andor, and Tellar. The effort only brought us closer together, and led to the founding of the Federation... and the Earth-Romulan War."

"It's hard for you to comprehend how actions in this era can affect another millennia ahead. But please, trust me, this is more than taking away humanity's time in the sun. Letting the Romulans supplant humanity in the Federation will have catastrophic results."
"How fitting. Looks like you're about to make another one."

"The Tal Shiar are headed now to try and overwrite humanity's history with this alternate, Romulan-dominated version instead. I've given you the information and the tools to stop them. It's up to you to do so."
